description.value:
Induces Relaxation and intoxication to those exposed to light filtered through this liquid substance. When using it imposes -1d10 to Perception and Willpower for an hour, and must make +0 Toughness check or fall unconcious. Only seems to work on Humans.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
